DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate the effect of exercise program on 3-dimensional scapular kinematics, disability and pain on shoulder impingement with scapular dyskinesia.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Exercise Programs on 3-dimensional Scapular Kinematics, Disability and Pain
DOC.criteria: Subacromial impingement with scapular dyskinesia Additional muscular and skeletal or systemic diseases
